hasAttributes.name: BOM
hasAttributes.description: Bill of materials for the items relating to a specific project, building, product development, etc.

hasAttributes.name: averageCost
hasAttributes.description: The average cost of the inventory item.

hasAttributes.name: binId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with Bin for recording inventory.

hasAttributes.name: binLocation
hasAttributes.description: The location of the smallest addressable unit of space in a warehouse where the inventory gets stored.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: closingStockQuantity
hasAttributes.description: The quantity of the closing stock at the end of a reporting period.

hasAttributes.name: closingStockValue
hasAttributes.description: The value of the closing stock at the end of a reporting period.

hasAttributes.name: countedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the person carrying out the counting of inventory.

hasAttributes.name: currentValuation
hasAttributes.description: Current valuation of the inventory.

hasAttributes.name: defaultInventoryMethod
hasAttributes.description: Default method used for calculating value of inventory.

hasAttributes.name: defaultStockingUnitOfMeasure
hasAttributes.description: Default number of units of measure ordered for this inventory product.

hasAttributes.name: displayOnFront
hasAttributes.description: The identifier or mark to identify the inventory displayed on the item or product.

hasAttributes.name: glAssetAccount
hasAttributes.description: Name of GL Account on which inventory asset value has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glCostAccount
hasAttributes.description: GL account to which the inventory list cost is posted.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryABCCode
hasAttributes.description: Grouping of the inventory into three categories "A" - most important, "B" - less important and "C" - least important.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryBarcode
hasAttributes.description: ID/code associated with identifying Inventory.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryClass
hasAttributes.description: Class of inventory to which the asset is assigned, e.g. raw materials, work-in-progress or finished goods.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryCost
hasAttributes.description: Cost of inventory at purchase in functional or header currency.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryCostMethod
hasAttributes.description: Identified cost procedure for booking or recording the inventory.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryDescription
hasAttributes.description: The description of the inventory item.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryHeldForCustomers
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify if the item is held for a customer.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryHeldForOthers
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify if the item is held for someone other than a customer.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryHeldForSuppliers
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify if the item is held for a supplier.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryItemCode
hasAttributes.description: Code used to identify inventory items.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryListPrice
hasAttributes.description: Usual or standard price of inventory item.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryProductId
hasAttributes.description: The inventory product identifier in the inventory transactions.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryProductName
hasAttributes.description: Defining the inventory or the product brand acquired.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryProductType
hasAttributes.description: The type of inventory products e.g. raw material, semi-finished and finished goods.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryProductVariants
hasAttributes.description: Product or item specifications, e.g. colour, size, etc.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryPurchaseYearToDate
hasAttributes.description: The value of the inventory purchased up to the reporting period or year to date.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryPurchasingUOM
hasAttributes.description: Quantity unit of measure, e.g. pack of 12 for inventory purchases.

hasAttributes.name: inventorySellingUOM
hasAttributes.description: Quantity unit of measure, e.g. pack of 12 for inventory sales.

hasAttributes.name: inventorySoldYearToDate
hasAttributes.description: The value of the inventory sold up to the reporting period or year to date.

hasAttributes.name: inventoryStockingUOM
hasAttributes.description: Quantity unit of measure, e.g. pack of 12 for inventory stocking.

hasAttributes.name: lastCountDate
hasAttributes.description: The last count date of the inventory list.

hasAttributes.name: lastDespatchedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date inventory last despatched.

hasAttributes.name: lastReceivedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date inventory last received.

hasAttributes.name: locationActiveFlag
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify whether a specific location for holding inventory is active or inactive.

hasAttributes.name: locationCity
hasAttributes.description: The physical city where the inventory item is located.

hasAttributes.name: locationCode
hasAttributes.description: A code by which inventory item location can be known as a shorthand.

hasAttributes.name: locationCountry
hasAttributes.description: The country where the inventory item is located.

hasAttributes.name: locationCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: locationDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the location where the inventory item is located.

hasAttributes.name: locationId
hasAttributes.description: ID of the location of the Inventory.

hasAttributes.name: locationLatitude
hasAttributes.description: The latitude in degrees of the location of the inventory item.

hasAttributes.name: locationLongitude
hasAttributes.description: The longitude in degrees of the location of the inventory item.

hasAttributes.name: locationParent
hasAttributes.description: Parent or owner of the inventory location.

hasAttributes.name: locationPostalCode
hasAttributes.description: The postcode of the building where the inventory item is located.

hasAttributes.name: locationStateProvince
hasAttributes.description: The state or province in which the inventory item is located.

hasAttributes.name: locationStreet
hasAttributes.description: The street of the address where the inventory item is located.

hasAttributes.name: locationType
hasAttributes.description: Type of the inventory location, e.g. warehouse, shop, storage, etc.

hasAttributes.name: lotNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identification number assigned to a particular quantity or lot of material or depending on the asset classified.

hasAttributes.name: obsoleteOrDamagedInventory
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify if inventory is obsolete or damaged.

hasAttributes.name: openingStockQuantity
hasAttributes.description: The opening stock quantity of the inventory appearing at the beginning of the reporting period.

hasAttributes.name: openingStockValue
hasAttributes.description: The opening stock value of the inventory appearing at the beginning of the reporting period.

hasAttributes.name: ownerId
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who owns the item.

hasAttributes.name: preferredSupplier
hasAttributes.description: The supplier that is preferred or considered in comparison to other vendors depending on price, functionality, performance, etc.

hasAttributes.name: primaryManufacturer
hasAttributes.description: Primary manufacturer of the item in inventory.

hasAttributes.name: primaryManufacturerProductCode
hasAttributes.description: Product code by which the primary manufacturer refers to the product.

hasAttributes.name: primarySupplier
hasAttributes.description: Primary supplier of the product.

hasAttributes.name: primarySupplierProductCode
hasAttributes.description: Product code by which the primary supplier refers to the product.

hasAttributes.name: productGroup01
hasAttributes.description: Product classified depending on the nature of business or operations, e.g. Rm, Non RM, etc.

hasAttributes.name: productGroup02
hasAttributes.description: Product classified depending on the nature of business or operations, e.g. Rm, Non RM, etc.

hasAttributes.name: quantity
hasAttributes.description: Quantity on inventory list.

hasAttributes.name: quantityOnHandPhysicalCount
hasAttributes.description: Count of the inventory physical quantity available for use.

hasAttributes.name: quantityOnHandSystem
hasAttributes.description: The inventory quantity on hand reflected in the system.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: serialNumber
hasAttributes.description: Serial number for Inventory, used by manufacturer for identification.

hasAttributes.name: specificCost
hasAttributes.description: Actual specific cost of this individual item at time of purchase.

hasAttributes.name: standardCost
hasAttributes.description: Usual or standard cost of this item at purchase.

hasAttributes.name: stockAccountCommodityCode
hasAttributes.description: Code used to identify commodity held in inventory.

hasAttributes.name: stockCharacteristic
hasAttributes.description: The key features or nature of the stock in the inventory list.

hasAttributes.name: stockCharacteristicValue
hasAttributes.description: Value associated with specific stock characteristic.

hasAttributes.name: supplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier from whom the inventory is purchased and to whom payment is due or from whom unused credits have been applied for. Must match the supplierId in SupplierMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: thirdPartyFacility
hasAttributes.description: ID or name of the third party facility used by the entity to host or utilise this item.

hasAttributes.name: unitPrice
hasAttributes.description: Cost or price of one unit.

hasAttributes.name: uomToUOMBaseConversionFactor
hasAttributes.description: Factor conversion of UOM with similar characteristic, e.g. for UOM of "hour, minute, second", the base UOM is "second".

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: writeDownDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the inventory reduced value / write down description due to damage, theft, shrinking of market trends, etc.

hasAttributes.name: writeDownFactor
hasAttributes.description: Factor or identifier considered for the inventory reduction / written down value.
